text: John Keaton Buckley (born 13 October 1999) is an English footballer who plays for Blackburn Rovers. ==Career== ===Blackburn Rovers=== Buckley joined Blackburn Rovers as a 6 year old and has risen through the youth ranks.https://www.rovers.co.uk/teams/development- squad/profiles/midfielder/john-buckley/ On 26 January 2018, Buckley signed his first professional contract. On 1 March 2019, Buckley signed a new long-term deal with the club. On 16 March 2019, Buckley made his debut for the first team in the Football League Championship game against Sheffield Wednesday. On 2 November 2019, Buckley scored his first senior goal for Blackburn Rovers in a 2–1 win against Sheffield Wednesday at Ewood Park. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=2|Blackburn Rovers |2018–19 |EFL Championship |2||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- |2019–20 |EFL Championship |20||2||1||0||2||0||0||0||23||2 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !22!!2!!1!!0!!2!!0!!0!!0!!25!!2 |} ==References== Category:English footballers Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
